message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  We can always negotiate in later rounds if you're not happy with that.
I think a 51/49 split is a fairer starting point.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
Okay, I'll compromise. Let's go with 55/45 this time. It's a bit closer to what I want, but I'm willing to meet you halfway.
